price: Akasema: Enyi watu wangu! Mimi sina upumbavu. Lakini mimi ni Mtume niliye toka kwa Mola Mlezi wa viumbe vyote.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي سَفَاهَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Akasema: Enyi watu wangu! Katika wito huu sina upungufu wa akili hata chembe, wala mimi si mwongo. Lakini mimi nimekuja na uwongofu, na mimi ni Mtume wa Mwenyezi Mungu kwenu, naye Yeye ndiye Mola Mlezi wa viumbe vyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī safāhatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
